proposedChanges.value: Add a clear tagline under the logo.
proposedChanges.rationale: To instantly convey the brand promise.

proposedChanges.value: Position the CTA button at the center of the hero section.
proposedChanges.rationale: To draw immediate attention to the action.

proposedChanges.value: Include client logos or testimonials near the top.
proposedChanges.rationale: To build trust quickly with new visitors.

proposedChanges.value: Implement a sticky CTA on scroll.
proposedChanges.rationale: To keep conversion options always visible.
To emphasize the solution offered by LaunchBase first.
risks: May confuse users expecting problem-first flow

proposedChanges.value: Simplify pricing section with a comparison table.
proposedChanges.rationale: To make pricing details easier to parse.

proposedChanges.value: Add a 'Featured In' section with media logos.
proposedChanges.rationale: To enhance credibility and social proof.

proposedChanges.value: Increase the visual weight of key benefits.
proposedChanges.rationale: To ensure benefits stand out over other elements.
